unnormalised: Ayurveda treatments have been a lifesaver! My back pain vanished after visiting a Vaidya in Kerala back in 2018. Thinking of going again next month on 10/10/2024. Anyone recommend a good place near Rishikesh? Heard good things about Patanjali Yogpeeth. Planning a 09:00 hrs yoga session daily before the treatments. Hopefully, I'll be able to walk 5 km pain-free by Diwali! My friend Priya swears by her daily Triphala at 7:00 AM.
normalised: Ayurveda treatments have been a lifesaver! My back pain vanished after visiting a Vaidya in Kerala back in two thousand and eighteen. Thinking of going again next month on tenth October two thousand and twenty four. Anyone recommend a good place near Rishikesh? Heard good things about Patanjali Yogpeeth. Planning a nine A M yoga session daily before the treatments. Hopefully, I'll be able to walk five kilometer pain-free by Diwali! My friend Priya swears by her daily Triphala at seven A M.
